intro.description: I build and explore infrastructure and platform systems, with a strong focus on automation and reliability. I spend my time working on cloud-native environments, writing code to understand how systems behave, and improving the way they are built, deployed, and operated.

beyond.description: When I'm not in front of a terminal, I spend time learning about investing and markets, listening to music, and taking care of my cats. I enjoy reading non-fiction, thinking about how systems work in the real world, and occasionally tinkering with ideas just out of curiosity.
